entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 9:57 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times mixed with snow and ice pellets changing to snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
